column1: linnon is a Sindarin word appearing in "The Lay of Leithian Recommenced" (ca. 1950).
Didier Willis has suggested that linnon is the 1st pres. form ("I sing") of an unattested verb linna- ("to sing").Didier Willis
column2: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 19 July 2011)
